description: Ibibazo umubyeyi ahura nabyo mugihe atwite cyangwa abyara bikaba byagira ingaruka ku mwana, bishobora kugabanuka igihe ate ubuzima bwiza kandi afata indyo yuzuye mbere no mugihe atwite.
title: Ibibazo umubyeyi ahura nabyo mugihe atwite cyangwa abyara bikaba byagira ingaruka ku mwana, bishobora kugabanuka igihe ate ubuzima bwiza kandi afata indyo yuzuye mbere no mugihe atwite.
content: Ibibazo umubyeyi ahura nabyo mugihe atwite cyangwa abyara bikaba byagira ingaruka ku mwana, bishobora kugabanuka igihe ate ubuzima bwiza kandi afata indyo yuzuye mbere no mugihe atwite. Igihe ababyeyi batwite n’igihe bonsa, bakenera indyo yuzuye, ihagije kandi bakanakenera kuruhuka. Bagomba kurya ibintu birimo imyunyungugu kugira ngo ubwonko bw’abana bazabyara bukore neza. Imyunyungugu y’amoko anyuranye ikenerwa kandi igihe umubyeyi yonsa, n’iyo yaba abona indyo ihagije.
